title: Gemini 3 Pro vs Microsoft Copilot: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare Gemini 3 Pro vs Microsoft Copilot. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between Gemini 3 Pro and Microsoft Copilot? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Gemini 3 Pro vs Microsoft Copilot
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro (llms) is Gemini 3 Pro is Google's latest flagship AI model, launched in 2025 with groundbreaking multimodal capabilities. It achieves a 76.2% score on SWE-bench Verified (surpassing Claude Sonnet 4.5's 70%), features a 1M token context window with 64K output, and uniquely offers full native video processing alongside text and images. Its key differentiator is best-in-class reasoning combined with true multimodal understanding including video, making it ideal for complex analysis and agentic workflows.. It's known for llm, multimodal, video-understanding.

Microsoft Copilot (enterprise ai platforms) is Microsoft Copilot is an AI-powered productivity assistant deeply integrated into the Microsoft 365 ecosystem, including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Teams, and Loop. It leverages large language models (like GPT-4) and Microsoft Graph data to help users draft documents, analyze spreadsheets, summarize meetings, and manage workflows directly within their apps. Its key differentiator is its native, contextual understanding of a user's work across Microsoft's enterprise suite, making it a powerful tool for business and knowledge workers.. Users choose it for microsoft-365, productivity-ai, enterprise-copilot.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro: 76.2% SWE-bench Verified score (highest available), 1M token context window with 64K output, Native video processing (unique among all models)

Microsoft Copilot: Draft, edit, and summarize documents in Word with full context of other linked files, Analyze Excel data, generate formulas, and create PivotTables via natural language prompts, Generate meeting summaries, action items, and transcripts from Microsoft Teams meetings

verdict: Both Gemini 3 Pro and Microsoft Copilot are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Gemini 3 Pro for llm, Microsoft Copilot for microsoft-365.
